alert.note: Alert for Houston; Peach (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 5:26PM EDT until May 04 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Peach County in central Georgia... Central Houston County in central Georgia... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 525 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Miami Valley, or near Fort Valley, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Perry, Fort Valley, Warner Robins, Byron, Robins Air Force Base, Meadowdale, Sand Bed, Houston Lake, Lakewood, Powerville, Moss Oak, Bonaire, Miami Valley, Kathleen and Clinchfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
